I found three classes in package org.archive.crawler.fetcher
FetchDNS,FetchFTP,FetchHTTP

but the method "innerProcess()"  of ARCWriterProcessor.java wrote 
following code

        try {
            if (scheme.equals("dns")) {
                writeDns(curi);
            } else if (scheme.equals("http") || scheme.equals
("https")) {
                writeHttp(curi);
            }

does heritrix support FTP protocol???
thanks!
